statements: SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE id = 1;
SELECT result, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE nanostructure_id = 10;
SELECT id, biomolecule_id, result FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE biomolecule_id = 5 AND nanostructure_id = 8;
SELECT id, experiment_date, result FROM experiments WHERE result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, result FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, nanostructure_id FROM experiments WHERE biomolecule_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date >= '2021-06-01' AND result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT biomolecule_id, COUNT(*) AS experiment_count FROM experiments GROUP BY biomolecule_id ORDER BY experiment_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM experiment_records;
SELECT experiment_id, interaction_result FROM experiment_records;
SELECT nanostructure_name FROM nanostructures;
SELECT * FROM nanostructures WHERE nanostructure_material = 'Graphene';
SELECT experiment_id, nanostructure_name FROM experiment_records JOIN nanostructures ON experiment_records.nanostructure_id = nanostructures.nanostructure_id;
SELECT * FROM experiment_records WHERE interaction_result LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY experiment_id DESC;

SELECT experiment_id, nanostructure_name, interaction_result FROM experiment_records INNER JOIN nanostructures ON experiment_records.nanostructure_id = nanostructures.nanostructure_id WHERE nanostructure_material = 'gold';
SELECT experiment_id, COUNT(biomolecule_id) AS num_biomolecules FROM experiment_records GROUP BY experiment_id HAVING num_biomolecules > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT nanostructure_material FROM nanostructures;

SELECT experiment_id, interaction_result FROM experiment_records WHERE biomolecule_id IN (SELECT biomolecule_id FROM experiment_records WHERE interaction_result LIKE '%negative%') ORDER BY experiment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE nanostructure_id = 1;
SELECT nanostructure_name, nanostructure_type, nanostructure_size FROM nanostructures ORDER BY nanostructure_size DESC;
SELECT biomolecule_name, biomolecule_type FROM biomolecules WHERE biomolecule_type = 'protein';
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY experiment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE experiment_name = 'Experiment 1';
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM nanostructures WHERE nanostructure_type = 'Type A' ORDER BY nanostructure_size DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, biomolecule_name FROM experiments INNER JOIN biomolecules ON experiments.biomolecule_id = biomolecules.biomolecule_id WHERE biomolecule_type = 'Protein';

SELECT experiment_name, nanostructure_name, biomolecule_name FROM experiments INNER JOIN nanostructures ON experiments.nanostructure_id = nanostructures.nanostructure_id INNER JOIN biomolecules ON experiments.biomolecule_id = biomolecules.biomolecule_id WHERE nanostructure_size > 50;
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_date FROM experiments;
SELECT nanostructure_id, nanostructure_name FROM nanostructures ORDER BY nanostructure_id DESC;
SELECT biomolecule_name, molecular_weight FROM biomolecules WHERE biomolecule_type = 'DNA';
SELECT * FROM experiment_results WHERE result_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE nanostructure_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM nanostructures WHERE nanostructure_type = 'Metal' ORDER BY nanostructure_name DESC;
SELECT biomolecule_name, biomolecule_type FROM biomolecules WHERE molecular_weight > 1000;

SELECT er.result_data, e.experiment_date, n.nanostructure_name, b.biomolecule_type FROM experiment_results er JOIN experiments e ON er.experiment_id = e.experiment_id JOIN nanostructures n ON er.nanostructure_id = n.nanostructure_id JOIN biomolecules b ON er.biomolecule_id = b.biomolecule_id WHERE e.experiment_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM nanostructures;
SELECT id, name, type FROM biomolecules ORDER BY molecular_weight DESC;
SELECT name, structure, molecular_weight FROM biomolecules WHERE molecular_weight > 1000;
SELECT id, title, description FROM experiments WHERE location IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM results ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM nanostructures;
SELECT id, name, type FROM nanostructures WHERE size > 100;
SELECT name, type, created_at FROM nanostructures WHERE type = 'Carbon Nanotube';
SELECT id, name, size, created_at, updated_at FROM nanostructures ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM results JOIN experiments ON results.experiment_id = experiments.id WHERE experiments.location = 'Lab A';
